model

Class BinDecModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BinDecModel

  • public class BinDecModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores values to be converted in list. Enables to add and get value with methods, convert them to decimal and binary numeral system and verifies correctness of assigned value.
    Since:
    20-10-2019
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Michal Nowak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String convertedValue
      String representation of last converted value in decimal or binary numeral system.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> values
      List of String representations of values in decimal or binary numeral system.

      • getConvertedValue

        public java.lang.String getConvertedValue()

      • addValue

        public void addValue(java.lang.String value)
              throws IncorrectNumberException
        Verifies correctness of passed value before adding it to values List. If value is correct decimal or binary number, it is added to List. In other case, it throws an IncorrectNumberException exception.
        Parameters:
        value - String representation of value to be converted.
        Throws:
        IncorrectNumberException - Exception informing, that passed value is incorrect - neither decimal nor binary number.

      • verifyNumber

        private boolean verifyNumber(java.lang.String value)
        Verifies correctness of passed value. Returns true if number is verified - correct binary or decimal number. In other case, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        value - String representation of value to be verified.
        Returns:
        true if verified, false if unverified

      • convertDecToBin

        public java.lang.String convertDecToBin(int index)
        Converts values[index] from decimal numeral system to binary numeral system.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of values element to be converted.
        Returns:
        String representation of converted value.

      • convertBinToDec

        public java.lang.String convertBinToDec(int index)
        Converts values[index] from binary numeral system to decimal numeral system.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of values element to be converted.
        Returns:
        String representation of converted value.
